Hillcountry

A HillBilly country beat. Seems to work with ''Flowers on the Wall.''

  • HillCountry
  • HillCountryPlus
  • HillCountrySus
  • HillCountrySusPlus
  • HillCountryFill
  • HillCountryIntro
  • HillCountryEnd

HillCountry

Our basic hillbilly beat. Pretty boring. (4)
Bass FingeredBass
Chord Banjo
Drum-Hh OpenHiHat
Drum-Snare SnareDrum2

HillCountryPlus

Adds in another banjo. (4)
Arpeggio Banjo
Bass FingeredBass
Chord Banjo
Drum-Hh OpenHiHat
Drum-Snare SnareDrum2

HillCountrySus

Why not strings in the hills? (4)

Chord Banjo

Drum-Snare SnareDrum2

HillCountrySusPlus

Strings and banjos! (4)

Bass FingeredBass
Chord Banjo

HillCountryFill

Single bar fill with walking bass, good for repeats. (4)

A basic 4 bar intro. (4)

HillCountryEnd

An abrupt 2 bar ending. (2)
